name: odoo_desktop
description: A full desktop application for accessing Odoo in a secure and native environment

scripts.clean: rimraf build dist server/build server/main.spec server/__pycache__
scripts.build-python-win: cd server && pip install -r requirements.txt && pyinstaller --onefile --add-data "ddl_path.py;." --add-data "libusb;libusb" --collect-data=escpos --name main --distpath ../build/win-x64 main.py
scripts.build-python-linux: cd server && pip install -r requirements.txt && pyinstaller --onefile --add-data "ddl_path.py:." --add-data "libusb:libusb" --collect-data=escpos --name main --distpath ../build/linux-x64 main.py
scripts.build-win: npm run clean && npm run build-python-win && npm run build-electron-win
scripts.build-linux: npm run clean && npm run build-python-linux && npm run build-electron-linux
